Text: eterraJohn I wanted to clarify my email I sent from work I dont think I was specific enough On the day ahead position that hourly would manage lets say it is in the short term ercot book In ettera if you go to that book you will not find that trade So the only way to adjust it is to go and do it in the portal Also if you have a day ahead position and we manage it hourlyif we were to adjust it for balday for instance if we were long mw in the pool and we sold mw balday it would reflect the change But if we came back and did another trade and submitted to xml it would change back to mw We need to change how we show a buy from frontera We now have to buy from frontera and then sale back to them This was a way to fix the problem short term but it should not be a long term solution And ettera is still very time consuming It takes anywhere from min to enter a trade for just one hour I hope this is more specific Get your FREE download of MSN Explorer at intlasp
